## Source: ossf-package-analysis (91bc5eb19ec4b7c2e2a5758e9d1e9aedcb3eb9104966b2560e98ca0ed1e64f54)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'com.unity.assetgraph' @ 9.9.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
